sentences.sContent: Colonial style gardens are formal layouts of herbs, vegetables, and flowers surrounded by fieldstone, gravel or lawn walks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Colonial style gardens are formal layouts of herbs, vegetables, and flowers surrounded by fieldstone, gravel or lawn walks.
sentences.sCn: 群体性花园，是整齐匀称的布局。 将草本植物、蔬菜、花卉，环以大卵石、砂砾或草坪小径。
